name: Rogue Star (itch) (Liquid Moon Productions)
description:
It's a full moon tonight...

The moon lighting up the sky...

Jazz flowing through the night sky...

A perfect night...

For the party-goers...

For the men guarding precious treasure...

And especially for the elusive thief - Rogue Star.

Rogue star is a well-known thief in these bayous.  Always appearing in the night, chasing after precious artifacts and jewels. It's no wonder why he is so wanted. Yet no matter how well known he is, no one can seem to even catch a glimpse of his face. 

And tonight is no different...

Goal

You will be playing as Rogue Star and trying to gather treasures while not getting caught. Your small figure helps allow you to get into small nooks and crannies but unfortunately, it's a disadvantage against the brutes that tower over you so fighting is no option. You can only avoid them and hope you won't make a scene. 

Credits

Bryce Deshotel - UI (start, pause, win, lose), Level design

Woodrow Crawford - Camera,  Player sound senses, Player Controls

Cailey Bianchini - UI (stealth), Enemy AI, SFX

Devin St. Germain - Environment, Enemy Voice Lines

River Reigns - Animation, Modeling

Nathan Aytona -  Character/Enemy Blockout and sculpting
